UniprotID	Q6P087
Accession	Q6P087;B4DS39;Q6P6A9;Q8N1B2;Q8NAV3
EntryName	RUSD3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Mitochondrial mRNA pseudouridine synthase RPUSD3 (EC 5.4.99.-) (RNA pseudouridylate synthase domain-containing protein 3)
GeneName	RPUSD3
Length	351
Function	Catalyzes uridine to pseudouridine isomerization (pseudouridylation) of specific mitochondrial mRNAs (mt-mRNAs), a post-transcriptional modification necessary for their translation. Acts at position 390 in COXI mt-mRNA and at position 697-699 in mitochondrial COXIII mt-mRNA (PubMed:27974379). As a component of a functional protein-RNA module, consisting of RCC1L, NGRN, RPUSD3, RPUSD4, TRUB2, FASTKD2 and 16S mitochondrial ribosomal RNA (16S mt-rRNA), controls 16S mt-rRNA abundance and may play a role in mitochondrial ribosome biogenesis (PubMed:27667664).
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion matrix
Disorder	0.4330,0.4582,0.4801,0.4119,0.3392,0.3740,0.3948,0.3053,0.2258,0.2575,0.2849,0.2094,0.2129,0.2258,0.2884,0.2817,0.3053,0.2470,0.2364,0.2918,0.2224,0.2541,0.2609,0.2752,0.3117,0.3840,0.2849,0.2951,0.4017,0.5055,0.4801,0.4685,0.5951,0.6089,0.6089,0.6089,0.7459,0.7331,0.8085,0.8162,0.6851,0.7755,0.7250,0.7209,0.7080,0.7799,0.6851,0.8013,0.8085,0.8013,0.8313,0.7459,0.7250,0.7209,0.6183,0.5342,0.5665,0.5296,0.5493,0.4685,0.4652,0.5456,0.5456,0.5577,0.4766,0.4149,0.3872,0.4369,0.3631,0.3529,0.3215,0.2680,0.3053,0.2715,0.2783,0.3460,0.4149,0.3840,0.4149,0.3321,0.3392,0.3494,0.2783,0.2849,0.2783,0.3807,0.4476,0.4409,0.3910,0.4979,0.4330,0.4652,0.4940,0.5577,0.6806,0.6712,0.6806,0.5854,0.5951,0.4725,0.4507,0.5139,0.4409,0.4409,0.4619,0.4725,0.3631,0.3566,0.3599,0.4330,0.3286,0.3948,0.3182,0.3182,0.3286,0.3019,0.3087,0.2328,0.3087,0.2436,0.2503,0.3460,0.3215,0.3807,0.4541,0.4186,0.4220,0.4940,0.4940,0.4864,0.4149,0.4220,0.3494,0.3460,0.3392,0.3249,0.2328,0.2575,0.3249,0.3249,0.3566,0.4119,0.4119,0.3599,0.3631,0.3631,0.2817,0.1702,0.1759,0.1852,0.1554,0.2224,0.2884,0.3249,0.4017,0.4051,0.4409,0.5419,0.4725,0.4766,0.3840,0.3215,0.2951,0.2224,0.3053,0.3149,0.3149,0.3019,0.4409,0.4051,0.3631,0.3910,0.4017,0.3948,0.4256,0.3321,0.3286,0.2680,0.2364,0.1914,0.1852,0.1914,0.2884,0.3249,0.3019,0.3087,0.2988,0.2292,0.3392,0.2258,0.2645,0.2258,0.2609,0.1852,0.1852,0.1583,0.2783,0.2715,0.3053,0.3321,0.4256,0.3321,0.3286,0.3286,0.3182,0.3426,0.3321,0.3356,0.4119,0.3149,0.3948,0.4017,0.3566,0.3286,0.3321,0.2645,0.2680,0.2364,0.2399,0.2364,0.2328,0.1424,0.1969,0.2002,0.1349,0.1373,0.1298,0.1323,0.1501,0.0929,0.1501,0.1048,0.0483,0.0967,0.0909,0.1399,0.1298,0.1554,0.1028,0.1092,0.0909,0.0592,0.0618,0.0765,0.0749,0.0646,0.0749,0.0799,0.0463,0.0380,0.0704,0.0719,0.0909,0.1048,0.1048,0.0870,0.0870,0.0929,0.0888,0.1373,0.0851,0.0618,0.0948,0.1528,0.1528,0.1275,0.1349,0.0676,0.1251,0.1611,0.1731,0.1759,0.1852,0.2129,0.3356,0.3392,0.3740,0.3740,0.3740,0.2884,0.2951,0.3774,0.4330,0.3460,0.2
